content: Hello everyone, I am new to this, I have created my simple local website now I want to transfer it to the hosting, what steps should I follow or where can I find the steps to follow? Thank you

Hi, Alejandro Faic치n. Welcome to the Backdrop CMS community on Zulip. I'm your friendly neighborhood Dragonbot. Try '@Dragonbot help' for a list of things I can help you with. There are lots of friendly humans that hang around here, so please feel free to ask questions.

Here is a short (3 min) video to help you navigate Zulip. https://youtu.be/DN8YL2MrsSU

Hey @Alejandro Faic치n Try to start from https://docs.backdropcms.org/documentation/deploying-a-backdrop-site
Good luck!
Hello @Alejandro Faic치n :wave: ...how did you go with this task? Is there any further help you need? ...also, did you find the documentation useful, and do you have any feedback on improving it?
